function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of information technology on the global city","Impact":"Global city becoming a process rather than a place, leading to changes in urban relationships and infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Integrating virtual places with physical ones, and creating sustainable cities that make economic, social, and cultural sense in an electronically interconnected world.","Technologies":"Digital infrastructure, telecommunications, virtual integration","People":"Residents of global cities, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Urban development authorities, technology companies"},{"Description":"Digital domination over physical infrastructure","Impact":"Growing domination of the digital over the physical, leading to shifts in urban design and daily lives.","Mitigation":"Extending the definitions of architecture and urban design, integrating virtual places with physical ones, and interconnecting through telecommunication links.","Technologies":"Digital infrastructure, telecommunications, virtual integration","People":"Urban residents, city planners, architects","Owner":"Urban development authorities, technology companies"},{"Description":"Imaginary future becoming a representation of the stable condition","Impact":"Conceptualization of an imaginary future becoming the stable condition, potentially leading to societal and urban changes.","Mitigation":"Continued study and adaptation of urban design strategies for an electronically interconnected world.","Technologies":"Urban design methodologies, digital infrastructure","People":"Urban residents, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Urban development authorities"}]}
